instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1502: What is A1502? A1502 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2014, Late 2013, Early 2015 with EMC 2875, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3476, 820-3536, 820-4924..

threads.title: macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> very slowly works on windows 10
threads.message:
Hello, please help me to go out from that charmed circle...

I made fresh high Sierra install on <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2013. then made bootcamp 100gb and when trying install it hands in random progress levels.

tried instal win when ssd was in MacBook Air, on it works perfect.

tried same ssd on other <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> also works normal

when put back to primary <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> it hangs on booting, one time booted till windows desktop, but cursor ir circle turning around. on Mac OS works perfect. 

tried PRAM reset, all same :(

threads.title: macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> very slowly works on windows 10
threads.message: No idea, it is Windows so yeah. Swap the board with another machine that never will use Windows.
